body:
Hello,
dodgy here :3.

     So, I'm going on vacation for about 2 weeks. I will be on the forums but probably not in-game to much. I hope this doesn't ruin my chances of being staff. Ill see you guys in-game in about 2 weeks. (Im leaving on Tuesday and coming back around the 22nd. See ya until then ;)
 

Cheers,
dodgy

title: Going On Vacation, :D.

replies.body: Hope you have a fun time.
replies.body_tagged: Hope you have a fun time.
